//Valid Phone Numbers
    0010 44 4242424
    0011 2289 4242424
    
    1222894242424
    12 2289 4242424
    13-2289-424-2424
    13.2289.424.2424
    
    (0014) 44 4242424
    (0014)444242424
    
    
    //Invalid Phone Numbers
    00005 44 4242424
    54987 44 4242424
    0010 44898 4242424
    13.22222.2222
